meanings.definition: A kitchen tool used for beating eggs.
meanings.sent1: My mom used eggbeaters to mix the eggs for our breakfast omelette.
meanings.sent2: I bought new eggbeaters to make fluffy scrambled eggs.
meanings.sent3: The eggbeaters danced in the bowl as they whipped the eggs into a frothy mixture.
meanings.sent4: The chef's hands moved like eggbeaters, swiftly mixing the ingredients together.
meanings.sent5: The shiny eggbeaters gleamed under the kitchen lights as they worked their magic on the eggs.

meanings.definition: A brand of liquid egg product.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using eggbeaters in my baking recipes for a smoother texture.
meanings.sent2: She poured eggbeaters into the frying pan to make a quick and easy breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character on the eggbeaters packaging made me smile every morning.
meanings.sent4: The bottle of eggbeaters stood tall in the refrigerator, ready for the next meal.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling eggbeaters filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A type of hand mixer used for beating eggs.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's vintage eggbeaters were still in perfect condition after all these years.
meanings.sent2: He used the electric eggbeaters to whip up a delicious meringue for the pie.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted at the eggbeaters, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the eggbeaters whirring filled the kitchen with a comforting hum.
meanings.sent5: The eggbeaters hummed a tune as they spun around in the bowl, creating a fluffy egg mixture.
